original_title: Is It True Blondes Have More Fun?
overview: A graffiti remake of the classic Clairol hair dye ad from the 1960â€²s using hand-scratching and hand-coloring techniques. This video was originally featured in the multimedia performance work Cabaret Unkempt by Jennylin Duany. It was later exhibited on a giant outdoor screen at the entrance to the Holland Tunnel in New York City.
title: Is It True Blondes Have More Fun?
